gallery.name: TBC Concept Clone
gallery.description: This Project was created as an assignment for TBC Academy.Participants had to create the clone of this website https://tbcconcept.ge/ge/. It was created using vanilla JA, CSS and Bootstrap library

gallery.name: Real Estates Project
gallery.description: This application allows to manage real estate listings. You can create a new listing, add a new agent. Also, you can filter and find your real estate buinding using region, price, area and bedroom quantity filters

gallery.name: Tasks Management Project
gallery.description: This application allows to manage tasks. You can create a new task and a new employee. You can also define priority and a category for the task. You can assign task to the dessirable employee and monitor its progress.
